docname: CASE OF HERRI BATASUNA AND BATASUNA v. SPAIN - [Turkish Translation] by the COE Human Rights Trust Fund
externalsources: Article 4 of the European Council framework decision on combating terrorism of 13 June 2002, referring to incitement to terrorism;European Council Common Position of 27 December 2001 on the fight against terrorism;Resolution 1308 (2002) of the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe on restrictions concerning political parties in the member States of the Council of Europe;Article 5, 9 and 10 of the Council of Europe Convention for the Prevention of Terrorism, which came into force on 1 June 2007 and was signed and ratified by Spain
issue: Section 9 § 2 (c) of the Institutional Law no. 6/2002 of 27 June 2002 on political parties (LOPP)
judges: Alejandro Saiz Arnaiz;Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger
scl: Dicle pour le Party de la démocratie (DEP) v. Turkey, no. 25141/94, § 57, 10 December 2002;Ezelin v. France, 26 April 1991, § 45, Series A no. 202;Gorzelik and Others v.
